Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary  Westbound Reroute near 35th/Shield
ShortDescription: Westbound #35 31st/35th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Wentworth, Pershing, due to street blockage near 35th/Shield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #35 31st/35th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Wentworth, Pershing, Wallace then resume their normal route on 35th, due to street blockage near 35th/Shield.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago  Temporary Reroute near Chicago/Rush
ShortDescription: #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  due to street blockage near Chicago/Rush.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  due to street blockage near Chicago/Rush.

Eastbound buses will operate via Chicago, State, Superior and Michigan.

Westbound buses will operate via Chicago, Michigan, Ontario and State.

Allow extra travel time.
